entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:51 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 early this afternoon. High 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain mixed with light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
